rules_text:
{2}{G}, {T}, Exile a card from your graveyard: Put X +1/+1 counters on target creature you control, where X is the mana value of the exiled card. Activate only as a sorcery.
{2}{B}, {T}, Exile a card from your graveyard: Creatures you control gain menace until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery.
